product_name: Menasha Ridge Press 60 Hikes Within 60 Miles: Minneapolis and St. Paul - 3rd Edition
long_description: The updated. Author: Tom Watson. Softcover; 265 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Menasha Ridge Press; copyright 2012. Detailed descriptions help you assess each trail before you hike it, taking into consideration length and difficulty. Key information sidebar displays likelihood of traffic, trail surface, hiking time, season, access, maps, facilities and more. Written directions with road maps lead you to the trailheads. .
short_description: The updated 60 Hikes Within 60 Miles: Minneapolis and St. Paul explores 60 of the best hiking trails in and around the Twin Cities.
